summary: 1970s Beijing: two school friends, both with different backgrounds and families, lose touch, only to rekindle the romance in New York City, where they must decide between a present love or a future love.
cast: Nicholas Tse|Yuanyuan Gao|Haitao Du|Alice Li|Suet Lam|Xiao Che|Wenling Li|Pengyuan Shi|Shi Xinyi|Hao Qin|Anya|Dawei Tong|Jack Kao|Tianshuo Zang|Anna Sampson
title: Yi sheng yi shi
